title: Basic Logic Operations — AND, OR, NOT
description: Test your understanding of the three fundamental logic operations: AND, OR, and NOT.

questions.question: What is the output of the expression: 1 AND 1?
What does the OR operation return when both inputs are 0?
options: It depends on the variable names

questions.question: Which logic operation inverts the input value?
What is the output of the expression: NOT(1)?
Which of the following is true for the AND operation?
options: Returns 1 if at least one input is 1
Returns 1 only if all inputs are 1
Returns the opposite of the input
Returns 0 only if all inputs are 1

questions.question: Which Boolean expression represents the OR operation?
Which truth table result is correct for A = 0 and B = 1 using the AND operation?
Which of the following operations is considered unary?
